definition: the Americas/abbr. for 美洲[Mei3 zhou1]/USA/abbr. for 美國|美国[Mei3 guo2]
beautiful/very satisfactory/good/to beautify/to be pleased with oneself

sentences.english: The Little Mermaid is one of Anderson's more moving fairytales.
sentences.chinese: “美人鱼”是安徒生比较感人的童话故事之一。

sentences.english: She said mermaids sang much better than people.
sentences.chinese: 她说美人鱼的歌声要比人类好太多了。

sentences.english: Do you think the Little Mermaid will be safe during her journey and stay in Shanghai?
sentences.chinese: 你认为小美人鱼前往上海途中及在上海期间是否安全？

sentences.english: Little Mermaid is an old fairytale written by Hans Christian Andersen.
sentences.chinese: 美人鱼是安徒生写的一个古老童话。

sentences.english: Never mind. We'll be mermaids when we eat it.
sentences.chinese: 没关系，当我们变成美人鱼时会吃完的。

sentences.english: When morning came, the mermaid turned into a water bubble and went up to heaven.
sentences.chinese: 到了早晨，把水变成了美人鱼和气泡上升到天堂。

sentences.english: By the pool in the resort, the Little Mermaid and her friends.
sentences.chinese: 酒店泳池边，见到美人鱼同距既朋友仔。

sentences.english: A brown mermaid would be nice for once.
sentences.chinese: 这次有个棕色的小美人鱼也不错。

sentences.english: No one would buy her knowing that it was the real Little Mermaid.
sentences.chinese: 知道她是真正的小美人鱼后，没有人敢买她的。

sentences.english: In this special place merman and mermaids were always happy.
sentences.chinese: 在这个特殊的国度男人鱼与美人鱼一直过得很快乐。

sentences.english: D'you think mermaids' bread gets soggy underwater, Mum?
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，在水下美人鱼的面包会不会泡湿？

sentences.english: Her grandmother put a few white flowers into her hair.
sentences.chinese: 她的奶奶在小美人鱼的头发上插了几朵白花。

sentences.english: Mermaids are beautiful, fish-like animals. They are found in deep ocean.
sentences.chinese: 美人鱼是一种体形似鱼的美丽动物，生在深海中。

sentences.english: The little mermaid loved the prince, but her feet hurt very much.
sentences.chinese: 小美人鱼很爱王子，不过她的脚却很疼痛。
您将怎样搬移小美人鱼？

definition: RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912
Stephen Chow (1962-), Hong Kong actor, comedian, screenwriter and film director, known for his mo lei tau 無厘頭|无厘头[wu2 li2 tou2] movies
RMS Titanic, British passenger liner that sank in 1912 (Tw)/PRC equivalent: 泰坦尼克號|泰坦尼克号[Tai4 tan3 ni2 ke4 Hao4]
